channel.title: Hello edgevilliagep pking source help XD
channel.description:
hello guy's i was hopeing somebody knew how to code this
player rights <2 = no drop on death
so if an admin+ kill's a regular player can it make it so they dont drop either?
but if there killed by a regular player like < 0 v < 0 rights
they drop
to make the game fairer and alot funner and allowing staff to fight :D
if any 1 can help me
my msn is
blondey2010s@hotmail.com
thanks!
'Btw" using edgevilliage pking source <.<
